name: Death Can't Stop Me.
description:
Made as a submition for Newbies Game Jam 2022 - 2

Oopsie you've made it to the afterlife and you must platform your way out! Shoot your gun to create a platform allowing new heights to be reached. Build the best path to reach the exit. Death cannot stop you, now ESCAPE!

CONTROLS:

Movement: WASD

Place Platform: LeftMouseButton

Restart: R

Exit: ESC
